#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
int A[1005];
int B[1005];
int res[1005];
char str[1005];
int main()
{
	int T,i,N,idx,carry;
	long long K;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		
		memset(A,0,sizeof(A));
		memset(B,0,sizeof(B));
		memset(res,0,sizeof(B));
		scanf("%s",str);
		
		scanf("%lld",&K);
		idx=1004;
		
		N=strlen(str);
		
		for(i=N-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			A[idx]=str[i]-'0';
			idx--;
		}
		
		idx=1004;
		
		while(K>0)
		{
			B[idx--]=K%2;
			K=K/2;
		}
		
		idx=1004;
		carry=0;
		while(idx>=1)
		{
			res[idx]=(A[idx]+B[idx]+carry)%2;
			
			carry=(A[idx]+B[idx]+carry)/2;
			
			idx--;
			
		}
		idx=1;
		while(res[idx]==0)
		idx++;
		
		while(idx<=1004)
		printf("%d",res[idx++]);
		
		printf("\n");
		
		
		
	}
	return 0;
}
